profileText: a Representative from Utah; born in Columbus, Franklin County, Ohio, August 2, 1951; graduated from James S. Rickards High School, Tallahassee, Fla., 1969; B.S., University of Miami, Coral Gables, Fla., 1975; professional athlete; business executive; nonprofit executive; entrepreneur; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).

creativeWork.name: Liberalism or How to Turn Good Men into Whiners, Weenies and Wimps
creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Owens, Burgess. Liberalism or How to Turn Good Men into Whiners, Weenies and Wimps. New York: Post Hill Press, 2016.

creativeWork.name: Why I Stand: From Freedom to the Killing Fields of Socialism
creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: ___. Why I Stand: From Freedom to the Killing Fields of Socialism. New York: Post Hill Press, 2018.
